name: Antony Okon
testimony: I thought a game was going to be extremely hard to make, but Tynker made it really easy

name: Rafaji Biliki
testimony: There's so much opportunity once they understand how coding works. It's amazing to see them create incredible things themselves.

name: Buda Rachel
testimony: CodeLab has made programming fun, exciting, and simple and will help lead kids into their future.
